title: MSC - number of ships 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of ships for 3 number of Ship Types.
Ship Type Chartered has the highest Number of ships and Orderbook has the lowest Number of ships.
The highest Ship Type Chartered has 384.0 more Number of ships than the lowest Ship Type Orderbook.

Ship Type Chartered has the highest Number of ships and Orderbook has the lowest Number of ships.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of ships for 3 number of Ship Types.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Ship Type in the x axis and Number of ships in the y axis.
Ship Type Chartered has the highest Number of ships and Orderbook has the lowest Number of ships.
The highest Ship Type Chartered has 384.0 more Number of ships than the lowest Ship Type Orderbook.
The Ship Type Orderbook has 2.03 times less Number of ships than average.
The Number of ships is 587.0 if we add up values of all Ship Types.
